title: Commit to Your LD
report: Commit for 2019 to connect with your LD. Attend the monthly meetings and get involved. We need to work in 2019 to make 2020 happen! Click on the link above and find your LD. Then, Google for your LD website to find the monthly meeting dates and how you can help. All LDs have many opportunities for volunteering.

title: Request to Speak
report: Want your AZ legislators to hear your voice? Request to Speak (RTS) is the answer! It's easy and quick. Stop by on Feb 10 to find out about RTS and learn how to navigate the system, letting your Reps know where you stand. We'll be there to show you how. Click on the link above for more information.

title: Support Mark Kelly
report: We can send a second Democratic Senator to Congress when we help to elect Mark Kelly. Join us for an afternoon with astronaut Mark Kelly, 2020 candidate to represent Arizona in the U.S. Senate, on May 31 from 4:30-6:30. Click on the link above.

title: Register Voters
report: Help register new voters from your home! All you need is a computer, printer, envelopes, stamps and a willingness to spend some time to make a difference. Click on the link and help Vote Forward with their proven approach to getting more Democrats registered and voting!

title: Support AZ DLCC
description: Help elect Democrats in the AZ House and Senate.
report: Help Democrats gain the majority in 2020. Republicans control both chambers of the AZ state legislature, but we're here to change that. Click on the link above and sign up today. Join us-The work for 2020 has already begun.

title: Outlaw Dirty Money
report: Outlaw Dirty Money is back. We're working to ensure all Arizonans have a right to know who is paying to influence our elections. We need your help to get on the ballot in 2020! Go to this website to find where you can sign a petition. And, can you take a petition to gather signatures?

title: Support Raquel Teran
report: Support Raquel Teran's (LD 30) re-election campaign. Join us for her campaign kick-off at Tres Leches Caf√© on Sat, Nov 23rd at 10am. Click on the link above to RSVP and to donate.

title: Happy Thanksgiving!
report: Give thanks for the right to vote for candidates who will move AZ and the US forward. Commit to help to register new voters and to get out the vote in 2020.

title: International Rescue Committee
report: Donate to the IRC in Phoenix to help refugees who have been granted sanctuary in the US become self-sufficient. The IRC provides employment opportunities, counseling, English language instruction and opportunities for refugee children to integrate into and enjoy American culture. Click on the link to give today.

title: ActNowAZ
description: Click here for a simple explanation of how the ActNowAZ App works!
report: Every Tuesday, your iPhone or iPad will ping with a notification of a specific way that we can help to deliver for Democrats in 2019 and 2020. Open the App and you will have your idea for the week. And, the ideas for previous weeks will remain open, so check them out, too. Join us and make your voice heard and your actions matter.
